name: Abaddon
description_short: Shields his allies or himself from attacks
description_long: Able to transform enemy attacks into self-healing, Abaddon can survive almost any assault. Shielding allies and launching his double-edged coil at a friend or foe, he is always ready to ride into the thick of battle.

name: Axe
description_short: Taunts and forces enemies to attack him
description_long: One after another, Axe cuts down his foes. Marching ahead of his team, he locks his enemies in battle then counters their blows with a deadly spin of his weapon. Slamming his culling blade through a weakened enemy, he is always charging onward.
left_10: +12% Movement Speed per active Battle Hunger
left_20: +1 Bonus Armor per Culling Blade Stack

name: Arc Warden
description_short: Creates a copy of himself to split push
description_long: A splintered fragment of the same primordial power as the Ancients themselves, Zet the Arc Warden has pledged to see the clash between Radiant and Dire finally end. Assault lone enemies with fluxing energy, or distort space to generate a protective field around allies. Summon a Spark Wraith to patrol an area for enemies to infuse with harmful magic, then create a double of Zet, items and all, to overwhelm your foes.
left_15: +40 Magnetic Field Attack Speed/Bonus Magic Damage
right_25: No Damage Penalty Distance For Tempest Double

name: Bane
description_short: Puts his enemies to sleep, incapacitating them
description_long: Bane brings terror to his enemies with his arsenal of disabling abilities. Whether trapping a foe within a contagious nightmare, or gripping an enemy in place, he gives allies all the time they need to slay their enemy.

name: Batrider
description_short: Can lasso an enemy away from his team
description_long: Once he takes to the skies, Batrider can strike from any direction. Snatching a foe with his lasso, he soars above the treetops, pulling his prey through a trail of flame as he drags them before his merciless allies.

name: Anti-Mage
description_short: Slashes his foes with mana-draining attacks
description_long: Should Anti-Mage have the opportunity to gather his full strength, few can stop his assaults. Draining mana from enemies with every strike or teleporting short distances to escape an ambush, cornering him is a challenge for any foe.

name: Ancient Apparition
description_short: Launches a powerful icy blast from anywhere on the map
description_long: Able to launch a powerful blast of damaging ice across the battlefield, Ancient Apparition threatens to shatter weakened enemies wherever they are. Slowing enemies as he enhances his allies' effectiveness in battle, he is a constant threat to his foes.

name: Alchemist
description_short: Earns extra gold from unit kills and bounty runes
description_long: Synthesizing extra resources from each and every kill, Alchemist has no trouble gathering the tools needed to destroy his foes. Ambushing enemies with corrosive acid and a host of unstable chemicals, he battles to ensure his greedy escapades can remain uninterrupted.
right_15: Acid Spray grants armor to allies

name: Bloodseeker
description_short: Chases down low health enemies with increased speed
description_long: Bloodseeker forces difficult decisions on his enemies. Able to drive his foes to a retreat by bathing a large area with a damaging ritual, his gruesome ultimate asks his opponents to hold still, or die.

name: Bristleback
description_short: Takes reduced damage when facing away from enemies
description_long: When it comes to a fight, Bristleback really puts his back into it. Reducing all damage arriving from the rear or from the sides, he wades into battle with barely a care, spraying enemies with damaging quills and slowing snot.

name: Chaos Knight
description_short: Has strong but random damage output
description_long: Chaos Knight is an army unto himself. Able to summon a cavalry of clones to demolish enemy defenses, should an enemy present itself, he can rift reality to pull him and his phantasms close enough to rain brutal cudgel blows upon their head.

name: Broodmother
description_short: Hunts with her army of spiderlings
description_long: Gliding along her webs, Broodmother births an army of spiders to lead her team's forces toward the enemy base. As prey wanders near, she joins her children and attacks, slowing foes with incapacitating bites as she indulges her insatiable hunger.

name: Beastmaster
description_short: Summons beasts to aid his hunt
description_long: Summoning a poison-spitting boar and a scouting hawk to aid his hunt, Beastmaster never stalks the battlefield unprepared. Chopping through the forest with his axes, his stunning roar opens the way for his allies to devastate enemies.
left_10: +2.5% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack
right_15: +20 Movespeed Aura to Beastmaster and his units
left_20: +250 Max Health Aura to Beastmaster and his units

name: Brewmaster
description_short: Splits into three elemental spirits with unique abilities
description_long: A fearsome fighter in any situation, Brewmaster can turn the tide of battle by splitting into three elemental spirits, each with their own unique abilities. When not divided, he brings drunken chaos to his foes with slowing claps and powerful swings of his staff.
left_15: +1x Brewed Up multiplier for Drunken Brawler
left_25: Cinder Brew applies Fear when ignited

name: Bounty Hunter
description_short: Loots and collects bounties off of his enemies
description_long: Sneaking invisibly at the heels of his enemies, Bounty Hunter is always keeping track of his foes. Whenever one of his targets falls in battle, he and his allies stand to make quite a profit.
left_15: Half Track Bonus Speed to Allies

name: Centaur Warrunner
description_short: Reflects damage back to his attackers
description_long: Centaur Warrunner is a master of both inflicting and absorbing damage. Leading the charge into battle, he stomps to stun his enemies, and instantly counters their every attack. His stampede speeds his allies in both fight and flight, quickening the pace of the carnage.

name: Clinkz
description_short: Stalks invisibly to ambush lone enemies
description_long: When Clinkz stalks invisibly through the battlefield, none are safe from ambush. Swift of foot and arrow, he rains fiery death upon his foes, calling upon an army of blazing compatriots to bolster his assault.

name: Chen
description_short: Converts creeps to his cause, building an army
description_long: Converting the creatures of the forest to his cause, Chen leads his makeshift armies to aid his team in battle. He assaults enemies with beasts while sending friends to safety. Then, when things seem darkest, he heals his allies wherever they may be.
left_25: +200/+10 Hand of God Heal/Heal Over Time
right_25: Hand of God applies a Strong Dispel

name: Clockwerk
description_short: Launches himself into enemies with his hookshot
description_long: Launching himself into enemies with his grappling hookshot, Clockwerk isolates targets and blasts them apart with disorienting shrapnel. As he scouts the battlefield with his handy flares, he never has trouble finding targets to send himself toward.

name: Crystal Maiden
description_short: Unleashes a high damage blizzard upon her foes
description_long: Able to keep her allies supplied with mana as she slows down enemies to ensure a kill, Crystal Maiden is a helpful addition to any team. And, when the opportunity arises, she can unleash her massive ultimate ability to devastate her foes.

name: Dark Seer
description_short: Pulls and manipulates his enemies' positions
description_long: Versatile and strategic, Dark Seer excels at manipulating the positions of his enemies. Vacuuming foes into the attacks of his allies, he can turn enemy strength against itself by pulling foes through his replicating wall.

name: Dark Willow
description_short: Has an arsenal of disables at her disposal
description_long: A slight flutter from the shadows may be all an enemy sees of Dark Willow, as she eludes pursuit and controls her foe's movements with cunning fae tricks. Calling upon powers far more ancient than any scholarly magic, she binds enemies in place before unleashing the full wrath and terror of the fae realm upon them.

name: Dawnbreaker
description_short: Leaps to aid her allies, wherever they are on the map
description_long: Dawnbreaker shines in the heart of battle, happily crushing enemies with her celestial hammer and healing nearby allies. She revels in hurling her hammer through multiple foes and then converging with it in a blazing wake, always waiting to tap her true cosmic power to fly to the aid of her teammates â€” eager to rout her enemies on the battlefield no matter where they are.

name: Dazzle
description_short: Powerful healer who can briefly prevent death
description_long: Born to support his cohorts in battle, Dazzle keeps wounded allies alive so they might later rain death upon the enemy. His strange magic weaves its way into nearby armor, weakening enemies and strengthening friends.

name: Death Prophet
description_short: Summons an army of ghosts to attack
description_long: When she unleashes her army of ghosts, Death Prophet excels at demolishing enemies and their defenses alike. Leading her team's forces toward the enemy base with wave after damaging wave from her swarm, her onslaught can seem unstoppable.

name: Disruptor
description_short: Traps and silences foes in his static storm
description_long: Disruptor excels at shattering the plans of his enemies. Summoning impassable fences to trap targets as he calls down a silencing storm, should a foe attempt something unexpected he simply teleports them back to their earlier location.

name: Doom
description_short: Can prevent a single enemy from using abilties and items
description_long: One way or another, Doom shuts down his enemies. Devouring creeps to claim the various skills they had in life, he can place a lingering silence upon a foe's spells and items with his ultimate as he torches his foes.

name: Drow Ranger
description_short: Slows with her frost-tipped arrows
description_long: Not many can escape Drow Ranger once she's within range. After her foes have been silenced with a chilling blast, she finishes them off with a barrage of slowing, ice-tipped arrows that few can survive.

name: Dragon Knight
description_short: Transforms into a formidable ranged dragon
description_long: When he takes on his terrifying dragon form, Dragon Knight strikes fear into any who face him. Strong and adaptable, he can stun his enemies and burn all in front of him, often providing his allies the momentum they need to carry them to victory.
left_20: +75% Breathe Fire Damage/Cast Range in Dragon Form
left_25: +400 AoE Dragon Tail During Elder Dragon Form

name: Earth Spirit
description_short: Disables and repositions his enemies
description_long: Earth Spirit keeps the enemy in chaos and his friends in the fight. Adapting to any battle scenario, he can send his statue remnants back and forth to damage foes, or grips an ally from the jaws of death.

name: Elder Titan
description_short: Damages and disables with his astral spirit
description_long: Scouting the way with his astral spirit, Elder Titan can strike from any direction. Halting foes with a stomp of his hoof while his presence eats away at their defenses, he splits the earth itself to bring his enemies low.
right_10: +2% Astral Spirit Move Speed Per Hero

name: Earthshaker
description_short: Disrupts enemy team with his chain stuns
description_long: Whether blocking an enemy's escape, dividing their forces, or shattering the ground beneath gathered foes, Earthshaker is at his best when he strikes without warning. Whatever survives the aftershocks still has a swing from his mighty totem to look forward to.

name: Ember Spirit
description_short: Rapidly strikes and chains his foes
description_long: Swift and elusive, Ember Spirit strikes all nearby enemies in rapid succession, and ties them up with burning chains. Quickly rushing across the battlefield to arrive at one of his exploding remnants, few can avoid, or capture, his flame.

name: Enigma
description_short: Traps and damages enemies in a black hole
description_long: Widely feared for his ultimate ability, Enigma can summon a black hole capable of entrapping enemy forces, so that allies can then destroy them. An ever-present contingent of eidolons at his side, he pummels foes with ranged attacks.

name: Enchantress
description_short: Enchants neutral creeps to do her bidding
description_long: Harmful up close and lethal at a distance, Enchantress skewers foes with attacks imbued to become more damaging the further they fly. Whether inflicting powerful slows on her enemies or charming forest creatures to fight her battles, she is never short of tools to win a fight.

name: Grimstroke
description_short: Disables enemies with a swipe of his brush
description_long: Skilled at manipulating battle from the outskirts, Grimstroke studies every movement and assesses each line, deciding when to emerge from inky darkness to disable his victims and bind them together with a swipe of his brush. He delights in unleashing phantom thralls to vex opponents, as he carefully considers how to dispatch multiple enemies with one fateful stroke.

name: Gyrocopter
description_short: Barrages with his cannon and homing missiles
description_long: With his arsenal of firepower at the ready, Gyrocopter soars into battle. Blasting all nearby enemies with shots from his cannon or hammering them with a barrage of rockets, if he is able to gather his full strength, he demolishes foes with ease.

name: Faceless Void
description_short: Can freeze his enemies in time
description_long: Time is everything to Faceless Void. He speeds time to dash between locations, manipulates it to dodge attacks, stops it in a large area to devastate his foes, and given enough of it to gather resources, he can make himself unbelievably powerful.

name: Invoker
description_short: Weaves magic with an array of spell combos
description_long: With an intricate arsenal of spells at his disposal, Invoker can adapt to any battle situation. Each configuration of his three spell components yields of one of ten spells, meaning he's never without a way to destroy or escape his enemies.

name: Hoodwink
description_short: Shackles her enemies to trees
description_long: Always at hand when trouble's afoot, Hoodwink lives to tangle with the threats that fill the haunted forest she adopted as her home. Toting a massive crossbow while still able to scurry through the woodland with the greatest of ease, Hoodwink is nearly impossible to keep tabs on in battle. Lose track and she'll pop out behind you -- your stunned carcass already dangling in one of her nets.

name: Huskar
description_short: Sacrifices his health to deal more damage
description_long: As his health lowers, Huskar's ability to slay enemies grows considerably. Able to instantly remove a portion of both his and an enemy's health with his ultimate, when near death he is able to throw his burning spears with devastating speed.

name: Jakiro
description_short: Freezes and burns enemies with magic
description_long: Jakiro is their own best friend. Not content to merely punish enemies with fire, the twins freeze them in place to force them to stand there and burn. With foes aflame, they turn to inflicting massive damage on enemy structures with their liquid fire.

name: Io
description_short: Links to its allies to buff them
description_long: Io has a talent for making allies more effective. A powerful companion, the wisp's tether speeds allies and stops enemies. Capable of linking to and teleporting across the battlefield with an ally, Io can make a dangerous ally even deadlier.

name: Juggernaut
description_short: Slices through his enemies with precise strikes
description_long: In a flurry of slashes, Juggernaut cuts down his foes. Sprinting and spinning into battle with reckless abandon, and nearly invincible once he is able to begin his assault, stopping Juggernaut can often be just as difficult as surviving him.

name: Keeper of the Light
description_short: Provides instant mana to allies
description_long: Keeper of the Light is a helpful addition to any team. Manipulating the mana of both his allies and enemies, he effortlessly destroys lesser foes with waves of illumination, then enters his spirit form to gather his team to press the assault.

name: Legion Commander
description_short: Increases power with each duel victory
description_long: Marching across the battlefield, Legion Commander challenges lone enemies in single combat. Each duel she wins increases the power of her attacks, until at last she can become a relentless one-woman army.
left_25: Press the Attack grants 1.5s Debuff Immunity

name: Kunkka
description_short: Disrupts enemy positioning and disables them
description_long: Kunkka is always predicting where his enemies will go next. Able to attack a location with a geyser of water or a ghostly shipwreck, should his aim prove true, he and his allies will have no trouble cleaning up whatever is left.
left_10: +25% X Marks the Spot Move Speed

name: Lifestealer
description_short: Infests other units for mobility and strength
description_long: Should Lifestealer get close to his prey, there is little that can save them. Travelling within a creep or an allied hero, once he nears a foe he explodes from his host body, surprising enemies and tearing into them with his claws.

name: Leshrac
description_short: Can deal heavy damage in an aura around himself
description_long: Leshrac's powerful spells lay waste to enemies and their defenses alike. Pushing deep into enemy territory with his devastating edict, careful timing of his ability to split the earth will stun foes, allowing his merciless allies to finish them off.
right_25: Lightning Storm Can Bounce Twice On Units

name: Lich
description_short: Unleashes a powerful attack that bounces between enemies
description_long: Drifting from battle to battle and sacrificing creeps to fuel his assaults, Lich is always ready to help his fellow heroes destroy their enemies with slowing frost. Should his foes be foolish enough to gather, his bouncing ultimate will ensure their demise.

name: Lion
description_short: Steals enemy mana to fuel his own abilities
description_long: Lion gives enemies little chance to retaliate. Stunning targets with a damaging row of spikes, or temporarily transforming them into a harmless critter, even if his powerful spells aren't enough, he and his allies should still have all the time they need to slay their foes.
left_15: +70 Max Health Per Finger of Death Kill
right_20: +20 Finger of Death Damage Per Kill

name: Lina
description_short: Increases attack and speed with every spell
description_long: As deadly as she is fragile, Lina effortlessly strikes down any foe foolish enough to be caught alone. Gaining attack speed with each spell she casts, she scours enemies with flame and heat lightning, ensuring few can survive her assaults.

name: Lone Druid
description_short: Commands a powerful spirit bear in battle
description_long: Battling alongside his powerful spirit bear, Lone Druid demolishes enemy forces and structures. Switching as needed between ranged and melee attacks with his transformation, should he have enough time to arm and strengthen both himself and his companion, there is little that can stop them.
left_25: +1000 True Form and Spirit Bear Health

name: Luna
description_short: Tears into her enemies with bouncing attacks
description_long: Riding swiftly into battle, Luna tears into her enemies with attacks able to bounce between targets. When foes threaten, she calls down the power of the moon as a single searing beam or as a lunar barrage, crushing those who stand against her.
right_20: 2 Moon Glaives fired on Lucent Beam

name: Lycan
description_short: Shapeshifts into a ferocious beast
description_long: As a man or as a wolf, Lycan devastates enemies with sharp claws and deadly jaws. Summoning stealthy wolves to scout ahead or assault a foe, his wolf transformation grants him the speed and strength to run down his enemies, or escape an ambush.

name: Magnus
description_short: Charges in to reposition his enemies
description_long: Enemies who are foolish enough to gather learn to fear the horn of Magnus. Able to pull nearby foes together, he can batter them with empowered attacks or skewer them with his horn to bring them before his merciless allies.
right_15: +6 All Stats per hero hit with Reverse Polarity

name: Medusa
description_short: Immobilizes her enemies with her stone gaze
description_long: Constant attack is the key to Medusa's success. Using her mana shield to stave off assault, she employs split shots to mow down waves of enemies. Once she gathers her full strength, she becomes a force powerful enough to stop anyone in their tracks.
right_10: +15% Mystic Snake Turn and Movement Speed Slow

name: Marci
description_short: Dashes around pummeling enemies with rapid attacks
description_long: Proving that undying loyalty yields unrivaled power, Marci always marches into battle ready to raise fists in defense of her companions. Effortlessly flinging friends and foes around the battlefield, she happily bounds into any brawl, able to grant allies a deadly edge and unleash a hidden power strong enough to make even gods reconsider the wisdom of a hostile path.

name: Mars
description_short: Traps his foes in an inescapable arena
description_long: The warrior deity Mars thrives in the heart of strife, guarded by the bulk of a deadly shield as he skewers enemies with his legendary spear. He revels in facing opponents in an arena ringed with loyal spearmenâ€”who guarantee that no one escapes and that whatever odds he's facing, the god of war can dictate the terms of battle knowing the crowd is forever on his side.
left_25: Arena Of Blood Grants Team +180 HP Regen

name: Monkey King
description_short: Springs from the cover of the tree tops
description_long: Always in search of a good fight, Monkey King travels atop the trees aiming to spring from leafy cover and surprise his enemies. Calling upon an army of monkey soldiers to overwhelm opponents, this agile trickster revels in the chaos of battle, ready to slam his legendary staff down on any hopes of escape.

name: Meepo
description_short: Five are stronger than one
description_long: By summoning up to five permanent copies of himself, Meepo can fight from every front at once. Spreading his clones throughout the battlefield, when an enemy is found, he binds his foe, gathers his selves with an explosive teleport, then buries what remains.
left_15: Earthbind grants True Strike on Targets

name: Mirana
description_short: Stuns enemies with precise arrows from afar
description_long: As she takes aim from a distance with her deadly arrow, Mirana must always be ready to leap into battle. Able to shield her allies from the eyes of her enemies, she ensures that her team is always on the prowl.

name: Muerta
description_short: Blasts fearsome trickshots and unleashes ethereal ruin
description_long: Muerta is a master of death who stalks the lands of life, corralling targets with fearsome trickshots and summoning revenants to smother her foes. Always ready to pick off unwary targets with her spare gunhand, Muerta is at her most menacing when she crosses the veil of the dead to strike her enemies with the ethereal fury of the damned.

name: Naga Siren
description_short: Able to capitivate and disable enemies with her song
description_long: Sending squads of mirrored clones against her foes, Naga Siren ensnares and slays enemies as she leads her forces to victory. With the sound of her voice, she disables nearby foes to spring an ambush or crafting a hasty escape.

name: Morphling
description_short: Rides the waves to flank enemies
description_long: Shifting his attributes to suit his situation, Morphling can be as elusive as he is deadly. Whether riding a wave to flank an enemy, or boosting his health before escaping into his deceptive replication, few can hope to corner him.

name: Night Stalker
description_short: Enpowered by the shadows of nightfall
description_long: Once the sun goes down, Night Stalker's hunt begins. Charging through the shadowy forests, he snares prey in a slowing void as he tears them to shreds. Should sunrise threaten to end his terror, he can darken the skies to extend his onslaught.
left_15: +15% Hunter in the Night Status Resistance
right_25: +100 Hunter In The Night Attack Speed

name: Nature's Prophet
description_short: Able to teleport to any location on the map at will
description_long: Whether in the thick of battle or gathering resources for his next assault, Nature's Prophet seems to be everywhere. Teleporting at will to any location and instantly creating an army of violent trees to fight for him, he attacks where enemies least expect.

name: Necrophos
description_short: Damages enemies and heals allies simultaneously
description_long: Wherever Necrophos goes, enemies wither as allies thrive. Restoring health to his friends and harming enemies with each death pulse, once his very presence has eaten away at an enemy, he summons the reaper to lengthen their stay in the afterlife.

name: Omniknight
description_short: Tanky frontliner who protects and heals his allies
description_long: A guardian at the front lines of battle, Omniknight is always eager to join his team in battle. Whether healing an ally with a spell that also harms nearby foes, or battering an enemy with his mighty hammer, he protects his allies from harm.
right_20: +3 Heavenly Grace Strength/HP Regen per Debuff

name: Nyx Assassin
description_short: Reflects enemy damage and stuns
description_long: Nyx Assassin is always hunting for fragile targets. Sneaking invisibly through the forest, when he spots his prey, he swipes them with his deadly claws and impales them on stunning spikes, then reverses any counterattack with his reflecting carapace.

name: Ogre Magi
description_short: Uses a touch of luck to amplify his skills
description_long: With a chance to multiply the outcome of each spell they cast, a bit of luck is all Ogre Magi needs to burn enemies to cinder, or boost the power of his allies. Of course, luck can be difficult to rely upon...

name: Pangolier
description_short: Dashes and rolls in to disrupt enemy movements
description_long: Eager to dash into danger at a moment's notice, the Pangolier thrives on disrupting enemy movements and placing himself in the midst of chaos. Artfully guiding his blade between cracks in armor and shrugging off attacks with his protective scales, this graceful swordsman is always ready to roll into battle.

name: Oracle
description_short: Alters the fates of heroes with his buffs and nukes
description_long: By carefully combining his intricate abilities, Oracle controls the destinies of both friend and foe. Shrouding threatened allies with his false promise, he can grant an ally a few precious moments of protection to destroy an enemy, or even reverse a grisly fate.

name: Outworld Destroyer
description_short: Can imprison a hero, making them invulnerable
description_long: Stealing from the minds of those he imprisons, Outworld Destroyer turns raw intelligence into destructive power. Weakening enemies with a barrage of arcane energy, he shatters their sanity with his ultimate blast, often erasing mana from those that survive.

name: Phoenix
description_short: Heals and damages at the sacrifice of its own health
description_long: Diving into battle, Phoenix blasts enemies and heals allies with rays of solar flame. When the time is right, it can become a burning sun to scorch nearby foes before unleashing a stunning detonation that also restores Phoenix to full strength.

name: Phantom Assassin
description_short: Blinks onto her foes with critical strikes
description_long: The moment she finds her prey, Phantom Assassin strikes. Instantly closing in on a target, she effortlessly dodges attacks as she relentlessly cuts away at her foe. Without warning, any one of her attacks could prove suddenly and brutally fatal.

name: Phantom Lancer
description_short: Creates illusions of himself to trick or attack foes
description_long: Phantom Lancer storms enemy forces with an endless supply of clones. Leading his illusory army, he can cut foes apart in a breathtaking flurry of attacks, send clones to push into enemy territory, or use his doppelgangers to mislead and elude foes if cornered.

name: Pudge
description_short: Hooks and pulls enemies towards him
description_long: Each carefully aimed throw of Pudge's signature hook strikes fear into his foes. Pulling his enemies near to carve them with his cleavers, he gains additional health and damage with every kill, and soon becomes an unstoppable killer.
left_25: 1.5x Flesh Heap Stack Str and Damage Block bonuses

name: Primal Beast
description_short: Stomps over everything and smashes enemies into messy bits
description_long: Rushing savagely through enemies and allies alike, Primal Beast pounds into battle as one born to raise a ruckus. An unavoidable threat amidst any fray, the Beast can punish attackers and relishes grabbing prey to repeatedly slam them against the ground until nothing but mush remains.
left_15: Beast dispels himself when activating Uproar
right_25: Cannot be slowed or rooted during Trample

name: Puck
description_short: Orbs to enemies and silences them
description_long: Puck has a talent for confounding its enemies with playfully elusive mischief. By teleporting to its damaging orb in order to hop short distances, it attacks foes with bursts of silencing dust. By the time its enemies can react, Puck has long since escaped.

name: Pugna
description_short: Drains enemy life to heal himself
description_long: A crafty trickster, Pugna turns the enemy's power against itself as he blasts their defenses. While his nether ward strikes nearby foes that dare to cast a spell, he drains life from enemies to ensure he will be ready for the next assault.

name: Razor
description_short: Steals enemy damage to add to his own
description_long: With a deadly lightning storm at his command, Razor charges into battle. Deploying a sweeping ring of electrified plasma to fry his enemies, he links with foes to drain them of their power and use it against them.
left_20: --0.1s Eye of the Storm Strike Interval
right_25: Creates A Second Plasma Field Delayed By 0.8s

name: Queen of Pain
description_short: Blinks in to deal massive magical damage
description_long: Queen of Pain strikes without warning, destroying gathered foes with deafening screams. Should an enemy survive her onslaught, she slows their escape with a throw of her dagger before finishing them off.

name: Sand King
description_short: Burrows to stun and slow enemies
description_long: Not many can survive an ambush from Sand King. Demolishing everything around him with waves of deadly vibration from his ultimate, he evades counterattacks by hiding himself in a scouring gust of sand, and stuns foes by striking them from beneath.

name: Riki
description_short: Remains permanently invisible until the moment to strike
description_long: Riki stalks the battlefield, unseen by the enemy. He chooses his moment carefully and bursts forth in a puff of silencing smoke, stabbing at his foes before they even know he's there.
right_15: +40% Tricks of the Trade Agility Increase
left_25: Tricks of the Trade Applies a Basic Dispel

name: Rubick
description_short: Steals the spells of his enemies to use against them
description_long: Always seeking a new spell to steal, Rubick is ever eager to turn an enemy's most unique advantage against them. Snatching his enemies into the air to fling them where he will, he has no trouble sowing chaos among careless foes.

name: Shadow Shaman
description_short: Summons powerful serpent wards to deal damage
description_long: Shadow Shaman quickly clears the way for his team's forces to march on the enemy base. Blasting enemies with shocking spells and interrupting attackers with hexes, his powerful serpent wards destroy enemy defenses with ease.

name: Shadow Demon
description_short: Stacks exponential poison damage against his foes
description_long: Spewing clouds of demonic poison to damage enemies or scout the battlefield, few dare to approach Shadow Demon. Banishing an enemy as his allies gather for the kill, he can inflict demonic curses as he summons traitorous illusions to turn enemy strength against itself.

name: Shadow Fiend
description_short: Unleashes the souls of fallen enemies for damage
description_long: Capturing souls from every kill he makes, Shadow Fiend is always gathering his power. Every assault, each carefully aimed raze that kills an enemy, brings him closer to unleashing his gathered souls in a deadly blast of scouring energy.

name: Slardar
description_short: Chases down his enemies to weaken and bash them
description_long: Ready to find and demolish his foes, Slardar quickly slithers into battle. After exposing an enemy's position and shattering their defenses, he closes the distance to lock them in place with crushing blows and powerful bashes from his trident.

name: Silencer
description_short: Can silence all enemies on the map
description_long: Silencer changes the dynamic of every battle when he shuts down the enemy's ability to cast their spells. As he cuts his foes to ribbons with his glaive, he steals their intelligence to add to his own, ensuring his foes are always at a disadvantage.

name: Skywrath Mage
description_short: Casts high damage magical spells on a single target
description_long: Deadly and fragile in equal measure, Skywrath Mage quickly destroys his enemies with a barrage of powerful magic. He silences foes while increasing their vulnerability to spells, meaning he has no trouble vaporizing any who stand against him.

name: Sniper
description_short: Picks off his enemies from afar
description_long: Death from a distance is Sniper's specialty. He keeps his enemies on their toes with a steady barrage of firepower, and then, when the time is right, picks them off with a kill shot.

name: Slark
description_short: Slips in and out of skirmishes
description_long: Pouncing into danger then slipping back out is what Slark does best. He rushes at the chance to pin or corner a lone foe, steals their essence with each cut from his dagger, and is always ready to vanish should the tables turn.
right_20: +1 Agility gain/stolen per Essence Shift Stack

name: Snapfire
description_short: Mows down her enemies with heavy artillery and trusty lizard
description_long: Just as happy to blow your legs off with her trusty scattergun as to fill your belly up with a deliciously-dangerous cookie, Beatrix Snapfire delights in riding into battle with her dragon toad Mortimer, always ready to mow down their enemies with her homemade heavy artillery or finish them off with a steady barrage of Mortimer's firespit globs.
right_20: Lil' Shredder Uses Your Attack Damage

name: Storm Spirit
description_short: Zips across the map to engage in fights
description_long: Storm Spirit is never one to miss a fight. Zipping from across the battlefield in a bolt of lightning, he strikes enemies from every direction with exploding remnants and charged attacks, then disappears while his enemies are still scrambling to react.
left_25: 500 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning

name: Spectre
description_short: Haunts her enemies and teleports to her target
description_long: Spectre haunts her enemies wherever they may be. Able to destroy lone prey with ease, she spreads her presence throughout the battlefield to choose her target. Once she has gathered her strength, none can escape her terrible wrath.

name: Spirit Breaker
description_short: Charges down enemies from anywhere on the map
description_long: Highly mobile and always aggressive, Spirit Breaker charges across the map to bring the fight to his enemies. With each bash of his heavy lantern, he knocks his foes senseless. His enemies may run, but with the help of a few wards, they cannot hide.

name: Templar Assassin
description_short: Slows down enemies with traps
description_long: Peppering the battlefield with slowing traps, Templar Assassin hides invisibly, ready to ambush her prey. Once she springs her attack, she shreds enemies with piercing psionic blades, and deflects counterattacks with her refracting shield.
left_15: +120 Psi Blades Attack and Spill Range
right_15: Refraction Can Be Cast While Disabled

name: Sven
description_short: Cleaves down enemies with his incredible strength
description_long: Sven is always eager to charge into a fight. He stuns grouped enemies as he wades into battle, and once he ignites his damage-boosting ultimate, a few swings of his massive sword are often more than enough to slay his foes.

name: Techies
description_short: Surprises enemies with invisible landmines and explosive attacks
description_long: For the Techies, battle is a matter of mischief. Giggling while they lob sticky bombs around the battlefield, their hidden explosive mines, disarming zaps, and reckless blast-off attacks are enough to leave most enemies dead. Or at least enraged. Often both.

name: Timbersaw
description_short: Chops through the forest to face his foes
description_long: Elusive and unpredictable, Timbersaw chops through the forest to face his foes. Unleashing an arsenal of saw blades to cut enemies to pieces, he rides his chain into nearby trees and batters foes along the way.

name: Terrorblade
description_short: Transforms into a powerful ranged demon
description_long: With Terrorblade, nothing is as it seems. Conjuring powerful illusions to confuse enemies and break their defenses, the demon marauder can exchange health with foes and friends to stave off death or weaken his enemies.

name: Tidehunter
description_short: Durable hero who shrugs off enemy damage
description_long: Stalking ahead of his team, Tidehunter is always on the lookout for the right time to strike. When the moment comes, he unleashes his massive and devastating ultimate, paving the way for his allies to slay their stunned enemies.
left_25: 50% chance of Anchor Smash on attack

name: Treant Protector
description_short: Calls upon the forest to root his foes
description_long: Treant Protector is ever the benevolent ally, sprouting regenerating armor for his cohorts and their fortifications alike. Emerging unseen from among the trees, he binds foes with overgrowth as he leeches health from enemies and into nearby allies.

name: Tinker
description_short: Demolishes his enemies with swarms of machines
description_long: Tinker demolishes foes with swarms of machines and a host of deadly gadgets. If he can gather the resources he needs, the power that instantly refreshes his abilities enables him to lead his team from every front.

name: Tiny
description_short: Grows in size and strength as battle ensues
description_long: Growing to tremendous size and strength as the battle progresses, Tiny's power can quickly become terrifying. He tosses heroes and creeps at his enemies, or stuns them beneath an avalanche. Should he gather his full strength, he can demolish the enemy's base with ease.

name: Underlord
description_short: Teleports his team in and out of battle
description_long: Conjure waves of abyssal flame to immolate enemies held paralyzed in your spiteful grip. Feast upon the carnage of battle, gaining strength as foes perish around you, their attacks diminished by your very presence. Tear a rift in reality to teleport yourself and your teammates across the map, delivering bloody retribution to any who would defy the will of Vrogros the Underlord.

name: Troll Warlord
description_short: Swaps between ranged and melee attacks at will
description_long: Instantly able to swap between ranged and melee attacks, Troll Warlord is a formidable force at any distance. Axes in hand, he can strike in a storm of spinning blades. He takes down enemies with increasingly swift attacks, and can speed his allies' assaults wherever they are.

name: Tusk
description_short: Snowballs into his enemies to stun
description_long: Tusk is always eager to start a fight. Able to instantly corner an enemy with a wall of ice shards, he gathers with his allies and rolls into enemies inside of a massive snowball, bringing him in range to land his signature knockout punch.

name: Vengeful Spirit
description_short: Can swap herself with any nearby hero
description_long: Vengeful Spirit's presence is felt at all times, whether she is alive or dead. Able to swap positions with any nearby hero, stun enemies, and reduce her killer's effectiveness if she falls, she constantly brings confusion and chaos to her foes.

name: Undying
description_short: Summons hordes of zombies to attack his foes
description_long: Shambling into battle, Undying forces enemies to decide whether to flee his wrath or be torn apart by it. He drains strength from his foes, and summons a horde of clawing undead. When he finally becomes a hulking flesh golem, his enemies may already be overwhelmed.

name: Ursa
description_short: Deals more damage with every hit to the same foe
description_long: With each swipe of his claws, Ursa increases his target's vulnerability to his next attack. Capable of briefly increasing how swiftly he can strike, and able to slow down nearby prey, he quickly tears apart his enemies.
right_25: Enrage provides half benefits to allies in a 700 radius

name: Visage
description_short: Scouts and attacks with his familiars
description_long: As his deadly familiars scout the field, Visage cloaks himself in armor and seeks the next battle. Once near a skirmish, he gathers soul energy from damage inflicted upon nearby fighters before releasing it in a devastating attack.
right_15: +1 Armor Corruption to Visage and Familiars

name: Venomancer
description_short: Deals damage over time with venomous attacks
description_long: Venomancer brings slow death to his enemies. Sprouting an endless army of toxin-spitting watchers to defend his territory, should foes draw near he can release a massive cloud of lingering poison to weaken enemies.
right_25: Noxious Plague Aura reduces 200 Attack Speed

name: Viper
description_short: Poisonous toxins chip away armor and slow enemies
description_long: Launching deadly poison from a distance, Viper poses a grave threat to whomever he targets. As his various toxins eat away at an enemy's health and slow their movement, Viper simply does what he does best: he keeps adding more poison.

name: Weaver
description_short: Rewinds time to reverse damage and position
description_long: Weaver has no trouble evading enemies to position himself for another strike. Slipping in and out of sight, he avoids death by rewinding himself to an earlier position and health state. His arsenal of elusive skills ensures he is always a critical nuisance to his foes.

name: Void Spirit
description_short: Steps in and out of the mortal plane to strike his foes
description_long: Privy to secrets that would shatter a mortal mind, the Void Spirit emerges from his Hidden Temple to stand guard over multiple areas of the battlefield at once. Able to step into and out of the mortal plane at will, he easily outmaneuvers opponents to strike from wherever he desires, calling upon the powers of the aether to shield him in times of need.

name: Warlock
description_short: Summons powerful demons to fight at his side
description_long: Summoning forth his demonic golem, Warlock brings ruin to enemies and destroys their defenses. Yet even without his golem, his dark spells can still wreak havoc, whether healing allies and harming enemies with a word, or binding foes together to share their agony.
right_15: +12 Upheaval Attack Speed per second on Allies
left_25: 80% Magic Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems

name: Witch Doctor
description_short: Channels a high damage death ward
description_long: Witch Doctor is whatever his team needs him to be. Whether aiding his team with gradual healing, stunning and cursing foes to ensure a kill, or destroying enemies himself with a dance by his mighty ultimate, few can match Witch Doctor's versatility.

name: Windranger
description_short: Fires swift flurry of arrows at a single target
description_long: Evasive and swift, the nimble Windranger is always seeking the right angle to attack. Whether she's clearing the way with a draw of her deadly powershot, or shackling enemies together to pepper them with arrows, she's always on the move.
left_25: Focus Fire Kills Advance Cooldown by 20s.

name: Winter Wyvern
description_short: Able to force her enemies to attack their own ally
description_long: Winter Wyvern stalks the skies, slowing foes with burning cold as she soars over the battlefield. Should the enemy be foolish enough to gather, she curses them to attack one of their own as she blasts the gathering with icy splinters.

name: Zeus
description_short: Strikes enemies near and far with lightning
description_long: None can hide from Zeus, whether he's calling down a bolt to reveal the surroundings, sending an arc coursing through his nearest enemies, or summoning a terrifying volley of lightning upon all enemies. Wherever his foes are, Zeus will find them.
right_20: +4% Arc Lightning Current Health As Damage

name: Wraith King
description_short: Can reincarnate instantly upon death
description_long: Striding fearlessly toward his enemies, Wraith King stuns his foes and slashes them into submission. Should his enemies gain the upper hand, his self-resurrecting ultimate ensures he'll have another chance to swing his sword.
